title: Unique 1BR, 3-Story House, Perfect Location
description:
An incredible opportunity to live in a space all to yourself, in a great location for a reasonable price!
This trinity design dates to the early 20th century and has a lot of charm from a cottage sink to hardwood floors and a claw foot bathtub.
A one bedroom unit, it’s a great space for an individual or couple looking for their own home, spread out on multiple floors. The first floor features a kitchen, the 2nd floor has a bedroom and bathroom (recently renovated), and a third floor has a large room with high ceilings offering a great space for a living room with room for a work nook.
The basement has a new washer and dryer. Water is included; tenant pays gas and electric which tend to be very low. There is no central air, but window units are provided.
10 minute walk to girard street station on market frankford el; within minutes to frankford street retail and restaurants like Saraya, La Colombe, Mulherns, and local art at the Crane Arts Building and newly located Clay Studio, and so much more.
Available MAY 1. Asking $1,500: first month, last month, and security. Credit check/application required.

description:

∙  2.5 Bathrooms
∙  $2,415 monthly plus utilities (gas & electric in tenant’s name)

∙  Walk to public transit

∙  Minutes from Valley Forge National & Wissahickon Valley Parks, Morris Arboretum, Legoland Discovery Center, Please Touch Museum, Philadelphia Zoo, Eastern University, Philadelphia & Green Valley Country Clubs, IKEA, Giant, Target, Home Depot, Barnes & Noble, Wegman’s & King of Prussia & Plymouth Meeting Malls
∙  No pets
∙  No smoking
∙  Offering 1-year lease, or longer if needed
∙  Showing by appointment only
Questions / Showing - To schedule a showing please call  show contact info
or visit  https://showmojo.com/l/7fead100a9/
Application Process - There is $50.00 non-refundable application fee and a one-time lease administration fee of $25.00. Applicants must put up three months’ rent to move in (first months’ rent and two (2) months’ security deposit).  Del Val  will review your income(s), credit, rental and employment history and other information in order to verify that you qualify for the property.  To apply online, please copy and paste this link into your browser: https://application.dvapply.com/Office/7/DelValRealtyand/s_QKpUDttEG_9q4_LXO0Tg
Our Resident Benefits Program is included with all Del Val Leases and includes many benefits. One of the benefits is our ZeroDeposit Program using “Obligo.com” which is an alternative to traditional security deposits. For qualified residents this allows you to forego your two (2) months of security deposits. If you elect to participate in our ZeroDeposit Program there are additional fees. For more details please go to our website at www.delvalproperty.com and click on Zero Deposit Program. Additional benefits include Online Rent Payment, Concierge Utility Service, One-time Late Fee Forgiveness, One-time Non-sufficient Funds Forgiveness and many more. The cost for the Resident Benefit Program is $15.00 and is included in your monthly rent.

description:
Available NOW: Welcome to 244 S Warnock St! This is a wonderful 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom single family home in the heart of walkable Washington Square West. Enjoy the convenience of in-unit laundry and central air for year-round comfort. Your living room welcomes you home with a sun-soaked atmosphere and a decorative fireplace with mantle and built-in shelving. Continue back to your gorgeous kitchen boasting tile flooring, wood cabinetry above and below, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, microwave, gas oven / stove, and refrigerator. Head upstairs to the 2nd Floor to view 2 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom, and then to the primary suite on the 3rd Floor. This large primary bedroom offers abundant sunlight, good closet space, and an attached full bathroom for a luxurious lifestyle. There's a sizable brick patio for entertaining guests in the warmer months - schedule a tour today! About The Neighborhood: Washington Square West is a walkable neighborhood surrounded by convenient shopping, public transportation, and nightlife options. You'll be just a few blocks from City Hall, iconic South Street, Pennsylvania Hospital, Washington Square, Independence Hall, and the Walnut Street Theater. Close proximity to PATCO, Jefferson Station, the Broad Street Line, the Market-Frankford El Line, and ample bus routes. There are tons of local eatery and hotspots within small radius of this great home including Middle Child, Greenstreete Coffee, Little Nonna's, Strangelove's, Monster Vegan, Mixto, Dirty Frank's, Green Egg's Cafe, Yellowtail, and countless more! The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to retail stores, grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Vans, Tselaine, Anthropologie, Lagos, Madewell, Outdoor Voices, Tiffany & Co., Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Target, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!

description:
Welcome to 987 N 5th St! A stylish and elegant bi-level 2 BR apt in the heart of Northern Liberties waiting for you to move in. Enter into a large living room with original wide plank hardwood flooring and a decorative marble fireplace mantel. Continue on into the dining area and kitchen, which is in the process of receiving an upgrade with new hardwood flooring, granite countertops and a white subway tile backsplash. Retreat to the huge, private backyard great for BBQing, outdoor entertaining and container gardening. Upstairs you will find two bedrooms and a newly updated bathroom. There is an in unit washer and dryer in the basement, which also provides more than ample storage. The location can't be beat. Steps away from all that Northern Liberties has to offer as well as a short walk to Fishtown, Olde Kensington and the Spring Arts/Loft District. Pets are allowed on a case by case basis so bring your furry friends. Available for a May 1st move in. This one won't last so schedule your showing today!

title: Move right in to this fully updated two-bedroom/two-bath!
description:
Move right in to this fully updated two-bedroom/two-bath Graduate Hospital residence. Sun streams into the dramatic two-story living room, where a wood-burning fireplace is waiting to warm your winter days. Built-in bookshelves and excellent wall space for art complete the picture. Off of the living room is a storage room with laundry facilities and mechanicals for the unit. The eat-in kitchen is finished with neutral wood cabinetry topped in granite along with a stainless refrigerator, stainless undermount sink and a gas range. The kitchen also features a tile floor and backsplash, and the dining area includes bench seating with built-in storage. Access a rear deck from this level that provides a spot for a café table or chaise. There is a bedroom on this level served by a full bath with stall shower and pedestal sink. An upstairs bedroom also has a full bath with a tub/shower. Both bedroom closets include organizers. This is a great opportunity to join one of the city’s most vibrant neighborhoods close to Center City and points west into University City. **Disclaimer BOTH bedrooms do not have carpet anymore. Newly installed vinyl floors in both bedrooms.**

description:
2426 W Thompson St #2 - Absolutely stunning 2 bed 2 bed Brewerytown apt with the amenities you deserve! Available now!
Love at first sight? Your call...but this 2 bed 2 bath second floor Brewerytown apt will certainly take your breath away. From the shiny hardwood flooring to the ample natural
lighting through an obvious abundance of windows...or maybe its the stunning kitchen space with sleek white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances including: a microwave, gas stove, dishwasher; quartz counter tops on top of an incredible kitchen island with a breakfast bar-its obvious that this is not just another ordinary renovation. Enjoy a bright living space adjacent to a kitchen space your inner chef with love. A generously sized master suite (13'11" x 14'5") located in the front of the unit includes double door closet space, a small storage nook as well as a fabulous full ensuite bathroom with a soaker tub accentuated by designer slate tiling. In the rear of the unit you'll find The second bedroom (11'3" x 12'2") which comes complete with windows galore & deep double door closets as well as the the second full bathroom. A pseudo-balcony lies behind an otherwise, mystery door which feels just like a breath of fresh air!

title: 3br - 1942ft2 - Luxury furnished 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms for rent
description:
The owners are sad to leave this Dickinson Narrows gem so soon, but an amazing job offer has them saying goodbye. Don’t miss your opportunity to call this large 3 bed 2 bath with tons of character your new home! When you walk in your greeted with a wide-open living/dining room, coffured ceilings, recessed lighting, original wood floors and half bath. Move through to the beautiful eat in kitchen with hand painted Mexican tile accents and backsplash, newer floors and appliances and cozy breakfast nook with built in storage. Certainly no lack of space in this kitchen! Enjoy having coffee on your private back patio, plus, no need to bring the trash cans through the house, you can use your breezeway! The 2nd floor features 3 good sized bedrooms with an updated hall bath. On the 3rd floor you’ll find your large primary bedroom with updated ensuite bath. Beautiful beam and exposed brick detail, plus tons of closet space make this a great sanctuary. Also, enjoy beautiful nights and cocktails with friends on your large roof deck! The unfinished full basement provides plenty of room for all your storage needs with a newer washer and dryer.
Please call us at for more information about the house.

Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand

record. Your income needs to be at least two - three times the cost of rent.

Come home to the warm embrace of this Art Museum 1 bed 1 bath bi-level apt–with amenities tailored to enhance your lifestyle! Enjoy a stroll to the Barnes Foundation, Philadelphia Art Museum, Eastern State Penitentiary, as well as, an assortment of memorable bars & restaurants the neighborhood has to offer such as: Bar Hyyge, Bad Brother and Urban Saloon. There is a common area laundry room on site with several coin operated washers and dryers, as well a designated trash area. This property is dazzling with so much to offer and it won’t last long! title: Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge, 24/7 emergency maintenance service
description: Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
